page.title: 16MY FIRST DAY AT ST. BEDES
page.content: My first day at St. Bedes was a very{nerve racking experience}for me. I was not only changing to another school, but going to a much{bigger}and {stricter school}as well. At first I was very nervous, but as the day passed I gradually began to get more confident. On this first day we did not have to find the classrooms ourselves because we did not know where they were. So the{teachers}for every lesson came and took us to the next room. In the{lessons}we did not have to work but just listen to the teachers who were telling us about the things that we would be doing in the year. The thing I was really {worried about}was getting on the coach to go back home at 3.30pm, but that turned out alright. When I got home I could not wait to go to school again. James Llewellyn, aged 12, St.Bedes Sch
